properties.name: Marand, Marand County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Marand, Marand County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 281

Location: Iran

A thick sequence of Cenozoic volcanic rocks overlies Mesozoic limestones in an area c. 20 km NW of the city Marand.

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Sabalan volcanic plateau, Ahar County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Sabalan volcanic plateau, Ahar County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 205

Location: Iran

The area NW of Iran, immediately S of the border with Azerbaijan and W of the Caspian Sea, comprises a volcanic plateau, the southern margin of which is dominated by large Sabalan (Savalan) volcano. The plateau covers c. 15000km², while Sabalan extends...

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Saray volcano, Osku County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Saray volcano, Osku County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 231

Location: Iran

Volcano situated in a rift zone and forming an island on the eastern margin of lake Urmieh. It covers and area of 22 x 13km and reaches a hight of 800m.

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Mahabad lava flows, Mahabad County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Mahabad lava flows, Mahabad County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 349

Location: Iran

Scattered lava flows to the east of town Mahabad overlie Miocene and Jurassic to Cretaceous sedimentary rocks. Age probably Quaternary, based on freshness.

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Taleghan-Alemut Complex, Taleqan County, Alborz Province, Iran
properties.description:
Taleghan-Alemut Complex, Taleqan County, Alborz Province, Iran

Type: 270

Location: Iran

An area of c.750km² in the Elbruz Mountains between the Taleghan and Alemut rivers (Stalder, 1971). A thick succession of tuffs and lava flows is intercalated with sedimentary rocks of Miocene and Oligocene age. There are also dykes, sills and laccol...

properties.name: Qaleh-Khargooshi complex, Narestan Rural District, Aqda District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran
properties.description:
Qaleh-Khargooshi complex, Narestan Rural District, Aqda District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran

Type: 270

Location: Iran

The locality lies about halfway along the Urumieh-Dokhtar magmatic belt, together with and . The rocks consist of a sequence of lavas and pyroclastic rocks extending for ca. 25 km.

properties.name: Kariz Now Area, Torbat-e Jam County, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Kariz Now Area, Torbat-e Jam County, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran

Type: 270

Location: Iran

Extensive travertine deposits in the area related to hot springs, which are probably associated with recent volcanic activity. Age: Neogene or Quaternary.

properties.name: Qa'le Hasan Ali Maars, Kerman County, Kerman Province, Iran
properties.description:
Qa'le Hasan Ali Maars, Kerman County, Kerman Province, Iran

Type: 397

Location: Iran

A group of maar craters clustered around village of Qa'le Hasan Ali, with 2 others lying 10 and 15 km to the NE, were originally thought to have impact origin, but Milton (1977) showed that they are in fact phreatomagmatic. The largest known as Great...
